name: Kingdom of Epicland
blurb: The first game to combine the genres of Point-and-Click adventure with traditional RPG.

rewards.reward: Our thanks. We will add your name to the credits in the game under the \u201cKickstarter thanks\u201d section in the game credits.
The previous reward plus a full copy of the game once it is released.
All previous rewards plus you will receive all of the game DLC as it is released.
All previous rewards plus a limited Kingdom of Epicland supporter T-shirt. Will be available in all sizes. Black color only.
All previous rewards plus an autographed copy of the game's soundtrack on CD. This will be a professionally packaged CD and not just a burned disc.

All previous rewards plus the chance to play the game early throughout development stages as a beta tester, and have you name in the credits as such. Help us find bugs and submit your gameplay comments / suggestions. Your voice will be heard !

All previous rewards plus a mystery prize. It may be small, big, or multiple things, you will just have to pledge to find out! Mystery prize will be related to the game in some form, and will be a physical item/s that will be shipped to you.
All previous rewards plus the chance to have a character named after you in the game, and they will have any character personality traits/features that you want.

All previous rewards plus design your own side quest of the game. This can be anything from a simple retrieval quest, to helping a character plant evidence on another to frame him for a crime, or any other wild idea you may have. You will communicate with us through, email, Skype, or telephone to design your quest. Your name will also appear in the game's credits under \u201dAdditional quest writing/game design\u201d.

All previous rewards plus design three side quests of the game. You will communicate with us through, email, Skype, or telephone to design your quest. Your name will also appear in the game's credits under \u201dAdditional quest writing/game design\u201d.

All previous rewards plus be a voice actor in the game. You will play the role of your choice of a towns person or a combat companion. There will be a decent amount of dialog, and your name will appear in the \u201cVoice Actors\u201d section in the credits. This would be a good to combine with the \u201chave a character named after you\u201d reward. Must have your own or have access to decent recording equipment.

Two lunches at a restaurant of your choice with Randall and other staff to design your own level,dungeon,or town for the game. This will include layout, enemies, style, treasure, etc. If design isn\u2019t finished, work with us until it is complete via Skype or email. We can design it with your specifications, or if you have Maya or 3DS Max and wish to design it yourself, that would be fine too. Although you will be designing it, we will have the final say on approval, but don't worry, we are very accepting and will work with you to help you with your design. You can also discuss the game in personal detail and the future of the company at the meeting, or even get advise on any game you are making. Finally you will receive all physical prizes in person. We will travel to your town, but you must live in the Southern California or Las Vegas areas.
